original_prompt: A photo of a chair sawed in half.
video_prompt: The chair is slowly sawed in half.

original_prompt: A photo of a cat in a grass field.
video_prompt: The cat calmly walks forward, moving from the dry patch to a lush grass field.

original_prompt: A circus horse.
video_prompt: The horse trots gracefully, its mane flowing. Gradually, circus elements like colorful streamers and a spotlight appear.

original_prompt: A photo of a bird spreading wings.
video_prompt: The kingfisher begins to gently spread its wings.

original_prompt: A photo of a breakdancing dog.
video_prompt: The dog starts moving energetically, spinning and jumping into breakdance moves.

original_prompt: A photo of an open door.
video_prompt: The door handle turns slowly, and the door swings open.

original_prompt: A photo of a sleeping cat.
video_prompt: The cat slowly lowers itself onto the ground, curling up and closing its eyes to sleep.

original_prompt: A bowl of apples.
video_prompt: The apples slowly move out of their basket and gently roll into a bowl.

original_prompt: A bear eating a fish.
video_prompt: The bear walks toward a river, crouches down, and catches a fish, beginning to eat it.

original_prompt: A photo of a giraffe eating the grass below.
video_prompt: The giraffe gently lowers its long neck until its mouth reaches the grass, beginning to eat.

original_prompt: A photo of a closed book.
video_prompt: The pages of the book gently begin to close, one by one, until it is fully shut.

original_prompt: A photo of a teddy bear doing pushups.
video_prompt: The teddy bear slowly animates, moving onto the ground, and starts doing pushups with steady movements.

original_prompt: A photo of a birthday cake.
video_prompt: The chocolate cake slowly transforms into a colorful birthday cake, topped with candles that gradually light up.

original_prompt: A photo of a tomato in a blue tennis court.
video_prompt: The tennis ball gently rolls across the blue tennis court, gradually transforming into a ripe tomato as it moves.

original_prompt: A photo of a cat facing the camera.
video_prompt: The cat slowly turns to face the camera, its gaze shifting forward.

original_prompt: A girl riding a horse.
video_prompt: The horse slows to a halt as a girl swings onto its back.

original_prompt: Two bananas.
video_prompt: A second banana smoothly slides into view beside the first, resting parallel to it.

original_prompt: A photo of a rotten banana.
video_prompt: The banana gradually browns and decays, spots darkening until it becomes completely rotten.

original_prompt: A standing horse.
video_prompt: The horse gradually slows its pace, coming to a gentle stop, and stands still.

original_prompt: A goat and a cat hugging.
video_prompt: The goat and cat gradually move closer together. We notice the goat gently lowers its head, and the cat leans in until they are side by side in a gentle embrace.

original_prompt: Pizza with pineapple.
video_prompt: The video begins with a cheese pizza as slices of pineapple are added on top.

original_prompt: A parade on a street.
video_prompt: The empty street gradually fills with colorful floats and people marching, forming a lively parade.

original_prompt: A person riding on an elephant.
video_prompt: The elephant moves gracefully forward, and a person climbs onto its back.

original_prompt: A photo of a cat wearing a hat.

original_prompt: A person with crossed arms.
